user.title: Set up Fellow Aiden
user.description: Enter your Fellow Aiden account credentials.

init.title: Configure Fellow Aiden Advanced Options
init.description: Adjust advanced settings. Note: Changing the update interval will restart the integration.

data_description.update_interval_seconds: How often to poll the Fellow Aiden cloud (minimum 30 seconds, default 60 seconds). Lower values provide more responsive data but may impact performance.

error.too_fast: Update interval must be at least 30 seconds to avoid overloading the Fellow servers

create_profile.name: Create Brew Profile
create_profile.description: Create a new brew profile on the Fellow Aiden device.

ratio.name: Brew Ratio
ratio.description: Coffee-to-water ratio (e.g. 16 → 1:16 ratio). Must be one of 14–20 in 0.5 steps.

bloom_enabled.name: Bloom Enabled
bloom_enabled.description: Should the bloom phase be used?

bloom_ratio.name: Bloom Ratio
bloom_ratio.description: Amount of water used in bloom relative to coffee weight (1.0–3.0).

ss_pulses_enabled.name: Single Serve Pulses Enabled
ss_pulses_enabled.description: Enable pulses for Single Serve brewing?

ss_pulses_number.name: Single Serve Pulses Number
ss_pulses_number.description: How many pulses for Single Serve brewing? (1–10).

ss_pulse_temperatures.name: Single Serve Pulse Temperatures
ss_pulse_temperatures.description: A list of temperatures for each Single Serve pulse (e.g. [96, 97, 98]).

batch_pulse_temperatures.name: Batch Pulse Temperatures
batch_pulse_temperatures.description: A list of temperatures for each batch pulse (e.g. [96, 97]).

delete_profile.name: Delete Brew Profile
delete_profile.description: Delete a brew profile by ID.

create_schedule.name: Create Brew Schedule
create_schedule.description: Create a new brew schedule on the Fellow Aiden device. ⚠️ WARNING: Ensure carafe/cup is in place before scheduled brew time to prevent spills!

time.name: Time
time.description: Time of day to run the schedule.

amount_of_water.name: Water Amount (mL)
amount_of_water.description: Amount of water to use for brewing (150-1500 mL).

profile_name.name: Profile Name
profile_name.description: Name of the brew profile to use. Find names in the 'Fellow Aiden Profiles' dropdown.

profile_id.name: Profile ID (Alternative)
profile_id.description: ID of the brew profile to use instead of its name (e.g. 'p1').

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether the schedule should be enabled.

delete_schedule.name: Delete Brew Schedule
delete_schedule.description: Delete a brew schedule by its ID.

schedule_id.name: Schedule ID
schedule_id.description: ID of the schedule to delete.

toggle_schedule.name: Enable/Disable Brew Schedule
toggle_schedule.description: Enable or disable a brew schedule by its ID.

schedule_id.name: Schedule ID
schedule_id.description: ID of the schedule to toggle.

start_brew.name: Start Brew Now
start_brew.description: Starts an immediate brew (scheduled 2 minutes from now). ⚠️ WARNING: Ensure carafe/cup is in place to prevent spills!

profile_name.name: Profile Name
profile_name.description: Name of the brew profile to use. Uses the default profile if not specified.

profile_id.name: Profile ID (Alternative)
profile_id.description: ID of the brew profile to use instead of its name. Uses default if not specified.

water_amount.name: Water Amount (mL)
water_amount.description: Amount of water to use (150-1500 mL). Uses the device default if not specified.

list_profiles.name: List All Profiles
list_profiles.description: Lists all available brew profiles with their names and IDs.

get_profile_details.name: Get Profile Details
get_profile_details.description: Gets detailed information about a specific profile by its name or ID.

profile_name.name: Profile Name
profile_name.description: Name of the profile to get details for.

profile_id.name: Profile ID (Alternative)
profile_id.description: ID of the profile to get details for (alternative to name).

reset_water_tracking.name: Reset Water Usage Tracking
reset_water_tracking.description: Resets water usage tracking to start fresh. Use this if historical water sensors seem incorrect.

list_schedules.name: List All Schedules
list_schedules.description: Lists all available brew schedules with their details.

debug_water_usage.name: Debug Water Usage
debug_water_usage.description: Logs detailed water usage history for troubleshooting.

refresh_and_log_data.name: Refresh and Log Full Data
refresh_and_log_data.description: Manually refreshes all data from the Fellow API and logs the complete response.
